options.fig.cap: **Fig. 1.** Simulation of neutrally evolving plant-herbivore community, where the probability of a link in the PV and AP matrices is parameterized using frequencies estimated from the field data. We estimate that plant-volatile links occur with a probability of 0.8 and plant-herbivore links occur with a probability of 0.1. Compare with figure 3A in Zu *et al*.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-37
